tool.name: SAGA.imagery_segmentation.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayFEATURES True output_data_VARIANCE $output_data_VARIANCE output_data_SEED_GRID $output_data_SEED_GRID output_data_SEED_POINTS $output_data_SEED_POINTS name SAGA.imagery_segmentation.2 FEATURES $FEATURES SEED_TYPE $SEED_TYPE METHOD $METHOD BAND_WIDTH $BAND_WIDTH NORMALIZE $NORMALIZE DW_WEIGHTING $DW_WEIGHTING DW_IDW_POWER $DW_IDW_POWER DW_IDW_OFFSET $DW_IDW_OFFSET DW_BANDWIDTH $DW_BANDWIDTH prefer $prefer response $response outputType_VARIANCE $OutputSection_VARIANCE.outputType_VARIANCE transmissionMode_VARIANCE $OutputSection_VARIANCE.transmissionMode_VARIANCE outputType_SEED_GRID $OutputSection_SEED_GRID.outputType_SEED_GRID transmissionMode_SEED_GRID $OutputSection_SEED_GRID.transmissionMode_SEED_GRID outputType_SEED_POINTS $OutputSection_SEED_POINTS.outputType_SEED_POINTS transmissionMode_SEED_POINTS $OutputSection_SEED_POINTS.transmissionMode_SEED_POINTS

param.name: FEATURES
param.label: Features
param.help: Features The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, png

param.name: NORMALIZE
param.label: Normalize Features
param.help: Standardize the input features, i.e. rescale the input data (features) such that the mean equals 0 and the standard deviation equals 1. This is helpful when the input features have different scales, units or outliers.

param.name: DW_IDW_OFFSET
param.label: Inverse Distance Offset
param.help: Calculates weights for distance plus one, avoiding division by zero for zero distances

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_VARIANCE
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_VARIANCE
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_SEED_GRID
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SEED_GRID
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_SEED_POINTS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_SEED_POINTS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: The tool allows one to create seed points from a stack of input features. Such seed points can be used, for example, as input in the 'Seeded Region Growing' tool.<br/><br/>
